title: Microsoft.VisualBasic.targets encoding is not supported in .NetCore
body: When trying to build corefx using .net Core msbuild, the build will throw an error when trying to import Microsoft.VisualBasic targets since it's encoding is set to 'Windows-1252' instead of utf-8

nodes.body: This was fixed with #319.  Are you still seeing problems?
Jose was using my fork which probably doesn't have the fix for this.
I see, I'll close this issue then and will cherry-pick the fix to my fork. Thanks!
